overview: Excerpt from Dr. Malcom J Backer's Hyperexpiology Companion [revision 2b]:  "...the destructive system is self replicating and self propelling . Functioning like a clock . Systematically . Efficiently . Relentlessly . A mindless machine. It will never be enough . The clockmaker eventually loses control . We are dreaming of a new day when a new day isn't coming . "
title: Shapes - Variation III
